Aside from maintaining his websites, Munroe also engages in [[kite aerial photography|kite photography]], in which cameras are attached to kites and pictures are then taken of the ground or buildings.<ref>Ben Kuchera, ''[http://arstechnica.com/journals/thumbs.ars/2007/07/02/the-joys-of-kite-photography The joys of kite photography]'', [[Ars Technica]], [[2007-07-02]]</ref>
Aside from maintaining his websites, Munroe also engages in [[kite aerial photography|kite photography]], in which cameras are attached to kites and pictures are then taken of the ground or buildings.<ref>Ben Kuchera, ''[http://arstechnica.com/journals/thumbs.ars/2007/07/02/the-joys-of-kite-photography The joys of kite photography]'', [[Ars Technica]], [[2007-07-02]]</ref>

In addition, he has calculated automated lists of unbeatable target words for both players in the game of [[Ghost (game)|Ghost]] using the dictionary shipping with [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]].<ref>[http://blag.xkcd.com/2007/12/31/ghost/ Randall Munroe's blog entry about solving the game of ''Ghost'', dated December 31st 2007.]</ref>
